thread.title: MLG Blockchain Consulting Appoints Wall Street Investment Banker Kyle Fry as CFO

author: cnbc.com
title: MLG Blockchain Consulting Appoints Wall Street Investment Banker Kyle Fry as CFO

organizations.name: global blockchain firm welcomes finance authority

text:
Global Blockchain Firm Welcomes Finance Authority to Growing Consultancy
TORONTO--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- MLG Blockchain Consulting is pleased to announce the addition of Kyle Fry as Chief Financial Officer for the growing global enterprise blockchain consulting and development firm. Kyle is also a Certified Blockchain Expert (Blockchain Council) and is involved in various blockchain network groups such as Columbia Blockchain Alliance (CBA), BlockchainNYC.org , and Blockchain Education Network (BEN).
Founder and CEO of MLG Blockchain Consulting, Michael Gord says, “We’re very honored to have Kyle join our team, and know that his deep experience in finance, M&A, and Blockchain technology will be invaluable to us as we continue to experience growth across the globe.”
Prior to his role at MLG Blockchain, Kyle spent almost 10 years at Credit Suisse in the M&A group focusing on technology clients and transactions predominately in FinTech and payments. Kyle announced over $70 billion in transactions having led numerous deals from initial engagement to closing. Prior to Credit Suisse, Kyle was a financial analyst for five years at a multi-billion dollar global public company.
“I am joining a global team of experienced blockchain champions led by Michael Gord, a visionary who has been deeply involved in the blockchain ecosystem for over five years,” said Kyle Fry.
Kyle holds an MBA from Columbia Business School where he graduated with honors and a BS in Computer Information Systems from Colorado State University. Kyle is series 7 and 79 licensed.
About MLG Blockchain Consulting
MLG Blockchain is a global blockchain development and consulting firm headquartered in Toronto with a distributed team across North America, Europe and Asia that is focused on building next-generation applications using blockchain and smart contract technology. MLG Blockchain speeds up its clients understanding and potential opportunities for and implementation of blockchain technology.
For more information, please visit mlgblockchain.com , or follow @MLGBlockchain on Twitter and Facebook.
